20101207223143.000|20101207223145.000|CCO|>> YEAH, HEFTY PRICE TAG WOLF.

20101207223147.000|20101207223149.000|CCO|DEAL IS BETWEEN $700 BILLION AND
20101207223149.000|20101207223151.000|CCO|$800 BILLION WHICH MEANS IF 
20101207223151.000|20101207223153.000|CCO|APPROVED COULD BE ADDED TO THE 
20101207223153.000|20101207223155.000|CCO|DEFICIT.
20101207223155.000|20101207223157.000|CCO|THAT FACTORS INTO EXTENDING THE 
20101207223157.000|20101207223159.000|CCO|BUSH ERA TAX CUTS FOR TWO YEARS,
20101207223159.000|20101207223201.000|CCO|EXTENDING UNEMPLOYMENT BENEFITS 
20101207223201.000|20101207223204.333|CCO|FOR 13 MONTHS.
20101207223204.333|20101207223207.667|CCO|SO HOW DOES IT COMPARE TO OTHER 
20101207223207.667|20101207223211.000|CCO|PROGRAMS?
20101207223211.000|20101207223213.000|CCO|IT'S ROUGHLY THE SAME SIZE OF 
20101207223213.000|20101207223215.000|CCO|THE 2009 STIMULUS PACKAGE, 
20101207223215.000|20101207223217.000|CCO|ESTIMATED AT $814 BILLION.
20101207223217.000|20101207223219.000|CCO|AND THAT AS YOU REMEMBER WAS AN 
20101207223219.000|20101207223221.000|CCO|EXPENDITURE THAT GENERATED A LOT
20101207223221.000|20101207223223.000|CCO|OF ANGER AROUND THE COUNTRY, IT 
20101207223223.000|20101207223225.000|CCO|HELPED SPARK THE TEA PARTY

20101207223229.000|20101207223231.000|CCO|PRICE TAG, T.A.R.P., SHORT FOR
